amendment.description: An amendment to add a new subsection relating to the authority of Congressional leadership in making appointments.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Harper amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Harper.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Harper amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Harper amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
